cast.name: John Edward Layton John Edward Layton
布伦特·吉恩蒂尔 Brett Gentile
布鲁格斯·詹金斯 Burgess Jenkins
安德莉亚·鲍威尔 Andrea Powell
斯科特·迈尔斯 Scott Miles

introduction: John Schwert的重映片什么都不重要（In/Significant Others ）是一个复杂叙事剧，通过表现一个城市的居民的不同生活，每个人都与同一个地方凶杀案调查有关。这个乐团演员包括一个为了情绪受困扰的妻子回家的伊拉克战争兽医，一个生活在成功弟弟阴影中的新父亲，一个陷入网瘾的妹妹，摄影师企图挖掘他们现实背后的故事。对真相的追求成为生与死的斗争，微妙的操纵着所有人的关系暴露出来。A multi-narrative drama that navigates through the different lives of one city's residents, each of whom is connected to the same local homicide investigation. This ensemble cast of characters includes an Iraq War vet returned home to an emotionally disturbed wife, a new father living in the shadow of a successful older brother, a sister caught up in a web of addiction, and a cameraman who attempts to exploit the reality behind all of their stories, or at least his version of them. The search for truth becomes a life and death struggle as the subtle manipulation of all relationships is exposed.In/Significant Others is a psychological drama that explores the lives of one city's residents; each of whom is connected to the same homicide investigation. The ensemble cast includes an Iraq War veteran returned home to an emotionally disturbed wife; a new father living in the shadow of his successful brother; a sister caught up in a web of addiction; and a cameraman who attempts to exploit the reality behind all of their stories, or at least his version of them. The search for truth turns into a life of death struggle as the subtle manipulations of all relationships are exposed. In/Significant Others explores the nature of relationships - the give and take, compromises, controls and manipulations, whether subtle or overt, intentional or subconscious, between siblings, spouses, friends, lovers and coworkers...the film exposes abuses, infidelities, secrets and lies.
